signInHeadline:
Let's create
an account
to get started
signInDescriptionText: Before we start everything, we ask you to write your e-mail address and then create a strong password so that we can create a special account for you.
createInitialProfileHeadlineText:
Just a
few more steps
to sign up
createInitProfileBirthdayCheckbox: I want other users to see my birthday on my profile
